name: Unstable Balance
description:
This is a short submission to Ludum Dare 49. The Theme was "unstable".

Try to position the balls perfectly, to overcome the instability.

Drag the balls in position with the mouse, then press the "Release" button when you feel confident.

Visit the Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/unstable-balance
